column4: i'm noob on linux... i've downloaded new flash plugin... how am i supposed to acivate it on firefox?
did you download it from the software center? or from adobe?
it should install it to the appropriate place then and should be working after firefox is restarted
i first removed the one i got with sudo apt-get remove --purge adobe-flashplugin flashplugin* nspluginwrapper
then i used sudo apt-get install --reinstall adobe-flashplugin
Yeah I caught that the first time.
occording to what you typed you should be good to go then
trying to use chatroulette.com, for example, and it says that i need to update my plugin
I don't believe chatroulette.com works with linux but let me try
yeah works for me in chrome in firefox go to about:plugins
what version of ubuntu are you running?
np you should use the flashplugin-installer package from now on
